actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: To provide a uniform definition for the term United States vessel, and for other purposes.
short_title: Uniform United States Vessel Definition Act

summary.text: Uniform United States Vessel Definition Act - Amends Federal law to provide that the term "United States vessel" means a vessel documented or numbered under U.S. laws or titled under the law of a State. Makes conforming changes.

titles.title: Uniform United States Vessel Definition Act
To provide a uniform definition for the term United States vessel, and for other purposes.
